alert.note: Alert for Lapeer (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 11 at 4:25PM EDT until July 11 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM EDT FOR EAST CENTRAL LAPEER COUNTY... At 425 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Lum, or near Imlay City, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Imlay City around 430 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Kings Mill, Goodland Township and Burnside. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
